<script>        
function readCookie(name) {
    var nameEQ = name + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
        var c = ca[i];
        if(c.indexOf(nameEQ) !== -1){
			return c;
		}
    }
    return null;
} 
	
	// Checks if the SVT cookie exists and uses that as a proxy for myAberdeenshire login
	
	//if(readCookie("SVT") == null){
		
	//$("#loginButtons").html("<span class=\"sign-reg register\" role=\"button\"><a href=\"/my/\" class=\"btn\">myAberdeenshire</a></span>");
		
	//} else {
		
	//$("#loginButtons").html("<button class=\"btn sign-reg sign dropdown-toggle\" type=\"button\" data-toggle=\"dropdown\" aria-haspopup=\"true\" aria-expanded=\"false\">myAberdeenshire <span class=\"caret\"></span></button><ul class=\"dropdown-menu\"><li><a href=\"https://online.aberdeenshire.gov.uk/myaberdeenshire/Dashboard.aspx\">Dashboard</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://signin.mygovscot.org/portal/\">Update my details</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://signin.mygovscot.org/changepassword/CAS\">Change password</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://www.aberdeenshire.gov.uk/online/help/\">Help</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://online.aberdeenshire.gov.uk/myaberdeenshire/logout.aspx\"> Sign out</a></li>");
	//}
	if(readCookie("SVT") == null){
		
		$("#loginButtons").html("<span role=\"button\"><a href=\"/my/\"><p class=\"myBranding\"><span class=\"my\">my</span>Aberdeenshire</p></a></span>");
		
	} else {
		
$("#loginButtons").html("<p class=\"myBranding btn dropdown-toggle\" type=\"button\" data-toggle=\"dropdown\" aria-haspopup=\"true\" aria-expanded=\"false\"><span class=\"my\">my</span>Aberdeenshire <span class=\"caret\"></span></p><ul class=\"dropdown-menu\"><li><a href=\"https://online.aberdeenshire.gov.uk/myaberdeenshire/Dashboard.aspx\">Dashboard</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://signin.mygovscot.org/portal/\">Update my details</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://signin.mygovscot.org/changepassword/CAS\">Change password</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://www.aberdeenshire.gov.uk/online/help/\">Help</a></li><li role=\"separator\" class=\"divider\"></li><li><a href=\"https://online.aberdeenshire.gov.uk/myaberdeenshire/logout.aspx\"> Sign out</a></li></ul>");
		

		
}
	
</script>
